about_the_game:
Parts Unknown International is an online fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting games with a unique style. It gives the player different fighting styles to master. If you loved games like Def Jam Vendetta, Street Fighter, Ready 2 Rumble Boxing, or The Warriors, then you are sure to love this game.

Inspired by classic street fighting games like Def Jam Fight For NY, Parts Unknown combines stylish in depth fighting styles, beautiful music, and an online experience to keep you engaged.

Parts Unknown is a third person fighting game innovating ReadyPlayerMe technology to create a metaverse experience. Play as an orphan who has to fight for a reputation in order to save the orphanage you will meet different characters and crews along your journey!

The game in its current state features 3 open worlds, a gym to workout, different fighting styles, and autosave. Online Multiplayer is now available.

Parts Unknown is a third person fighting game innovating ReadyPlayerMe technology to create a metaverse experience. Play as an orphan who has to fight for a reputation in order to save the orphanage you will meet different characters and crews along your journey!

The game in its current state features 3 open worlds, a gym to workout, different fighting styles, and autosave. Online Multiplayer is now available.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570

name: Parts Unknown International

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10.
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • VR Support: n/a
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • VR Support: n/a

short_description: Parts Unknown International is an online multiplayer fighting game aiming to recapture the spirit of old fighting platformers with a unique twist.
